plot: A Jewish family goes on a journey from Brazil to Moldova in search of a lost grave. What else could hey find in a troubled foreign land?
title: Mamaliga Blues
plot_es: A Jewish family goes on a journey from Brazil to Moldova in search of a lost grave. What else could hey find in a troubled foreign land?
